about.title: About Doorshop1
about.description: Doorshop1 has been a leader in the sale and installation of finishing products since 1995. Our expertise and commitment to quality have made us the reference in Laval and surrounding areas.
features: Premium quality products from trusted manufacturers
Expert advice from our experienced team
Extensive showroom with the latest trends

installation.title: Professional Installation
installation.description: Our team of experienced specialists ensures flawless installation of all types of finishing materials. We guarantee high-quality work and adherence to deadlines to ensure your project is completed perfectly.
features: Professional installation of tiles and porcelain stoneware
Installation of flooring of any complexity
Installation of doors and decorative elements
Warranty on all types of work
